de.hu_berlin.german.korpling.saltnpepper.salt.saltCore.modules
Class SGraphAccessorModule

java.lang.Object
  de.hu_berlin.german.korpling.saltnpepper.salt.saltCore.modules.SGraphAccessorModule

public class SGraphAccessorModule
extends Object

This class provides some accessor methods for a given SGraph-object. It makes it easier to get some data just by one method.

Author:
Florian Zipser

getSRoots

public org.eclipse.emf.common.util.EList<SNode> getSRoots()
Returns all root nodes as a list of SNode- objects of the settedt SGraphobject. A root node is a node without incoming edges.

Returns:
a list of root nodes

findCycles

public void findCycles(CycleCheckerListener listener)
This method finds cycles in the given SGraph object (via setSGraph). Cycles can occurs in three different levels.
  1. ignoring the type (class) of relation and ignoring the sType
  2. ignoring the sType of relations
  3. searching for cycles for the type and sSType of relation
This method has no return type, therefore the notification for cycles will be done via callbacks for every cycle. Thus makes it necessary to give this method an Object of type CycleCheckerListener.

Parameters:
listener - the listener which will be noticed if a cycle has been found.
